transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan madam.
Executive: Haan sir maine aapko whatsapp pe message kar diya tha.
Customer: Haan aap mujhe step by step share kar do maine aapko message kiya hai.
Customer: Please wait karta hu.
Executive: Sir aap on call rehna mujhe aur bhi discussion karna hai.
Customer: Haan ji abhi karta hu.
Executive: Aap aap on call raho sir mujhe ek do cheeze aur bhi discuss karni hai aapse.
Customer: Kya keh rahe ho?
Executive: Main bol rahi hu ki aap on call raho main aapse ek do cheeze aur discuss karni hai buyleads ko lekar.
Customer: Theek hai band kar dena hai ye to ye band kar dena hai ye band nahi ho raha ek minute madam ye band nahi ho raha.
Customer: Sir aaj aapne koi lead consume ki hai ya sabhi leads specially aa raha hai jo bhi aap consume kar rahe the.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Main bol rahi hu jo leads aaj aa rahi thi ye issue aap aaj se hi face kar rahe ho na isse pehle bhi.
Customer: Aaj se hi shuru hui hai.
Executive: To haan ji shuru se.
Customer: Shuru se hi hai madam.
Executive: Shuru se hi aisa issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai hum karte hai dobara phone aate hai kabhi hamara naam naam dikhai nahi deta kahi pe system pe.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Meri pehle aapke haan main
Customer: Hamara naam kahi dikhai nahi deta isme jaise steel manufacturer mein naam aa hi nahi raha.
Customer: Hamare paas aur company ka naam aa jata hai hamara naam nahi aata ek second sir.
Customer: Hamara naam nahi aata aapke dekho aap by lead isme by lead hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ek minute ruko isme above 10000 dikha raha hai ye theek hai na above 10000 pe likhta hai you may change remove your current select.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapko kuch remove karna nahi hai main batati hu by lead pe aap jaoge na abhi aapko dobara main kya keh rahe ho?
Customer: Main bol rahi hu ki aap ek baar by lead pe jaoge na recent pe click karo aapko ek by lead dikhegi silver stainless steel kitchen sink aap ek baar usse contact karo.
Customer: By lead by lead pe gaya main.
Executive: Haan fir upar se recent recent ka option aa raha hoga relevant to recent aap recent pe click karo.
Customer: Relevant recent haan recent pe click karo.
Customer: Teen peech ki wohi aa rahi hai choti choti aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan choti choti aa rahi hai but aapka main issue jaanna chah rahi hu ki agar aap isme contact buyer now karoge to abhi bhi woh same issue hi aapko dikhayega ki previous apne previously kisi buyer ne isse consume kar liya.
Customer: Madam by lead pe jab hum jate hai to ye dikhata hai aap matlab aapko photo bheja hai.
Executive: Ek second.
Customer: Haan main abhi dekh rahi hu.
Customer: Haan ji kya baat hai madam.
Executive: Sir selection ya mere kuch issue aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan main batati hu sir ye aisa kyu show kar raha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapne yaha order value select ki hai above 10000 ki.
Customer: To above 10000 ki dikhata kyu nahi hai koi bhi ye bhi ye bhi koi shart nahi ho sakti iske andar.
Executive: Haan haan ye above ki tab nahi dikhata hai jab lead post hi nahi hoti hai agar kisi ne is 10000 se zyada ki lead post hi nahi kari hai kisi ko itni zyada quantity mein kuch chahiye hi nahi.
Executive: Theek hai to woh aapko nahi show karegi agar kisi ki order value usme aapko show kar raha hai ki usne 5000 se leke 7000 tak ke beech ki daali hai koi do product usne select kiye hai jinki order value 5000 hai theek hai woh aapko show karegi.
Executive: But agar aisa woh kam hota hai.
Executive: Kisi ne agar 10000 ki daali hai tab woh aapko show karega abhi kisi ne isme 10000 wali post hi nahi ki hai kisi ki requirement hi nahi hai itni badi value ki.
Executive: Isiliye woh aapko aisa show kar raha hai unavailable wala agar aap isse manually karoge ek baar aap ispe hi.
Customer: Are madam chalo main abhi baat karta hu dobara aapse.
Executive: Sir ek second hello.
Customer: Dobara baat karta hu madam.
Executive: Haan aap dobara kar lena bas aap ek baar mere samne ispe
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's name not visible in steel manufacturer list.

- Facing issue with leads, showing unavailable.

- Wants to discuss buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for unavailable leads.

- Explained order value selection affects lead visibility.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, order value, visibility
